plays.text: Penalty to Ville Nieminen 2 minutes for Hooking Ales Kotalik

Goal scored by Daniel Briere assisted by Dmitri Kalinin AND Teppo Numminen

Penalty to Henrik Tallinder 2 minutes for Hooking Jaromir Jagr
Penalty to Jaromir Jagr 2 minutes for Tripping Jochen Hecht
Penalty to Michal Rozsival 2 minutes for Hooking Daniel Briere
Goal scored by Ales Kotalik assisted by Teppo Numminen AND Paul Gaustad
